remarks: Left module vector sum is associative.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmodvacl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodvacl.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lmodass $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V /\ Z e. V ) ) -> ( ( X .+ Y ) .+ Z ) = ( X .+ ( Y .+ Z ) ) ) $.
